product_name: Tata Tea Gold, 500g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: We in our family have switched from Red Label to Tata Tea Gold now.Red Label is not bad, its just this one is better.This tea is perfect blend of aroma, taste and strong nature of tea. This is perfectly balanced tea between taste and kadak chai.Wagh bakri Tea is too strong with awful taste and Red Label is not so strong but taste good.This one got balanced both of it. So a must buy.

Received d product safe n intact But first time I received the very OLD dated products tea powder 7.5 month older and Ketchup is also 7.5 month older...:(Ketchup is to be used within 1.5 month... that to 1kg I have ordered.. :(sir, before this order I purchased Tata Tea Powder two months ago that product was received with Mfg. date 03/2017...!!! but now I received 2016 Mfg productsLoosing faith on Grocery Order...:(
Got it on deal arnd @190 rs.

The quality of the item is not up to the mark. The flavor and the strong test that we (me & my family) found in local shops of â‚¹10 pack of this tea is missing here.This item is fully useless in case of making liquor tea(red tea). If less liquor is given the tea seems nothing but boiled water & if given more the tea becomes black. I got stuck with this 500gm tea.
see the product is genuine with latest mfgIt was well packed toothe only griviance is that even after being a prime member I receive the product after a week hope amazon consider that for next time

I am mad of T...simply desi...malayi wala Chai...i have tasted many different brands of TATA tea and other brand too. but this got good flavour. the natural T flavor. Got in deal 190/- for 500gm not great discount from amazon. but outside genral store also gave me better discount.

Update - Last year when I bought this from here, it was original tea packet with good aroma and taste.So ordered again this in January as it was on lightning deal but to my very disappointment, I received either a duplicate product or the quality of tata tea has gone down horribly!No aroma, no taste! It's horrible!Very disappointed with this packet

best tea with a very nice flavor.its neither too strong nor light.perfectly balanced taste.after using tata tea gold you wont use any other brand.the product was genuine and delivered quite early.anyway  cloudtail india is the best seller on amazon.they always supply genuine products.i have bought a wide range of products from them and never had any cause for concern.i think the customer dissatisfaction sometimes arise due to delayed courier,damage or tampering during transit.anyway sometimes sellers are not directly responsible for some issues.
It's taste does not resemble India's Tata tea but it still tastes ok

reviews.review_title: It makes perfect kadak Indian chai
reviews.review_body: Have been using this tea for many years now. It makes perfect kadak Indian chai. However cost in Amazon is very high, normally it would cost not more than 5 pounds in the local shop ( FYI : its loose tea, not tea bags)
Bought to take to a friend who loves them, so not yet opened.
Good taste
A bit expensive but gorgeous tea
This tea is very light

reviews.review_title: Very grainy texture_not what I know about this tea
reviews.review_body: Tata Tea gold is known for its longer and premium tea texture,not grainy at all. But this pack of tea was more towards left over grainy tea throughout the package. No where i could see those longer textured tea which makes this tea separate from other tea brands. I am very much disappointed,not expected. The only saving grace was that i could taste some bold flavor somehow,that is why I have given 2 stars to this tea.

The best flavors of tea (and coffee) come from fresh product. Tea is a fermented-mildly-cooked leaf-based product. With each passing month, the flavors decay. This product may originally be good, but isn't if consumed about a year or more after the product was produced. That is the case here. I wish the sellers on Amazon disclosed the production date and expiration date; or at least guaranteed that the product was produced within 3 to 6 months prior to shipped-to-an-amazon-customer date.

I am an avid loose tea drinker. I had been using another CTC tea that I was purchasing on Amazon for years. I decided I would try this tea. Well, I will NOT be going back! This tea is soooo smooth and flavorful. The other tea would get bitter if brewed too long. NOT this tea! I love it, so glad I decided to try it!
They send me other tea no gold tea and the flavor is bad.
It is regular average quality tea priced double with the same type of tea.Mixtures of powder and leaf teas.
Throw it away
Its powder and some chopped tea leaves mixture, i am a regular milk tea drinker, the color was beautiful, not much aroma, good and strong taste.
This is the BEST tea to make chai
This is my favorite Indian tea.  It is aromatic and not too heavy.
